title: [Game] Would You Rather...

replies.body:
I'd rather get bitten by a poisonous scorpion, I hate spiders.

Now, would you rather travel to the future with the rare possibility of the world not existing, or travel back to the past?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Fuuuuuuuuuturreeeeeeeee *squidward doing sit ups* 


Would you rather binge watch the same show for the rest of your life or never get to sit down again?
